question:
Which of the following submitted to Akbar in 1570 A.D.?
1. Marwar
2. Bikaner
3. Jaisalmer
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: After the fall of Chittor in 1568 A.D., Ranthambhor and Kalinjar were captured. In 1570 A.D., Marwar, Bikaner, and Jaisalmer also submitted to Mughal emperor Akbar. Most of the leading Rajput rulers accepted the suzerainty of Akbar.
